Description.Value: Configure promotional armor stats and add special abilities. Features: Gold Golem Helmet (Daze Immunity), Gold Golem Body (Expert Heavy Weapons + Crystal SuperCharge), Gold Odin Body (Armor Buff + Radiant Hope), Gold Banshee Helmet (Gunslinger), PR Banshee Helmet (Frenzy), NW Phlegethon Legs (Jump), Viking Armor Set with Daze Immunity (Helmet), Regeneration + Fire Resistance (Body), and Goo Immunity + Jump (Legs). All abilities can be individually configured.
